message.hundreddayz.Gas: The air is thick with gas
message.hundreddayz.FinalDaySubtitle: At midnight the apocalypse will begin.
message.hundreddayz.WorldsEnd: The air smells of death. You can already feel the horrors this night will bring.
message.hundreddayz.EventEnd: As the sun finally rises, you can feel the invasion over.
commands.hundreddayz.StartBossEvent.succ: Bosses have been spawned, the event has now started

message.hundreddayz.Lava.Pickup: The lava is too hot to carry.
message.hundreddayz.Lava.Break: The lava melted through the bucket.
message.hundreddayz.PostJoinTeam: Sneak and right click to make your team follow you.
message.hundreddayz.Evolution_0: The zombies have evolved, now they can break blocks.
message.hundreddayz.Evolution_1: The zombies have evolved, now they can pillar.
message.hundreddayz.TFHordeStart: An enemy army appears at the horizon.
message.hundreddayz.TFHordeEnd: The sounds of gunfire start to fade.
message.hundreddayz.VillagerMessage0: Word has been spread among the surviving civillians of a %1$s, who has constructed a heavilly fortified compound.
message.hundreddayz.VillagerMessage1: Place a %1$s above your base structure's door and the civillians will start coming to you.
commands.hundreddayz.SpawnRaid.teamFail: you must be on the RED or BLU team to spawn a %1$s raid.

tooltip.hundreddayz.Landmine1: Takes 2 minutes after placing to become primed.

tooltip.hundreddayz.Turret1: Uses basic or incendiary ammo ammo.
